body_html:
Alright, I think I have found the solution.
That variable belonged to LOCAL_VARIABLES - adding to GLOBAL collection (in Python) and storing then restoring seems to have fixed the error. Meaning, in Java there might be only some kind of equivalent of a global initializer if applicable. Need to double test.

body:
Alright, I think I have found the solution. 
That variable belonged to LOCAL_VARIABLES - adding to GLOBAL collection (in Python) and storing then restoring seems to have fixed the error. Meaning, in Java there might be only some kind of equivalent of a global initializer if applicable. Need to double test.
